changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.27

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed app update download not working on Fire TV (direct HTTP download with redirect support)

### Previous fixes
- Fixed movie categories not appearing in group management
- Fixed adult categories visible to Kids profile in group management
- Fixed navigation getting stuck after adding/removing favorites
- Fixed EPG dialog appearing when double-clicking right on movies/series
- Fixed EPG overlay appearing on dashboard instead of only in fullscreen
